title: Inflation Data Outlook, Fintech, SALT, Ukraine Latest
itunes:title: Inflation Data Outlook, Fintech, SALT, Ukraine Latest
description:
Danielle DiMartino Booth, CEO and Chief Strategist at Quill Intelligence, LLC, joins the show to discuss her outlook on the Fed with CPI data due this week. David Dietze, managing principal and Senior Portfolio Strategist at Gladstone Bank joins to discuss how markets might react to new inflation data. Jeff Sloan, CEO of Global Payments joins to talk aboout the fintech sector and his outlook. Bloomberg equities reporter Jess Menton joins to talk about her latest piece on inflation for Talking Stock. Bloomberg's Katie Greifeld joins to talk ETFs. Bloomberg's Sonali Basak joins to discuss the latest Wall Street news, including the upcoming SALT conference. And Bloomberg Senior Reporter Marc Champion joins to discuss the latest in Ukraine. Hosts are Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
